articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: Nvidia’s $329 RTX 3060 graphics card is launching on February 25th - The Verge
articles.description: Nvidia’s next entry in the RTX 30 series, the RTX 3060, will launch on February 25th for $329. This is the most affordable RTX 30 card to date, and it will be available for purchase at retailers beginning at 9AM PT / 12PM ET.
articles.content: No Founders Edition will be made for the RTX 3060
